summary: A command‑line utility that scans DGL graph partition files, detects edge type names using the legacy format, converts them to the new canonical edge‑type representation, updates the associated metadata (edge type map, node type list, etc.) and rewrites the partitions so they are compatible with newer DGL versions.
business_intent: Provide a migration tool for graph datasets to maintain compatibility after a schema change in edge‑type naming, enabling seamless upgrades of stored graph partitions without manual editing.
